objects.name: Analytic 0086
objects.description: Outlook form execution upon message receipt or client launch results in automated code execution within user session. Form definitions deviate from standard templates and include script logic or COM object calls embedded in form fields.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:unified
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Unusual form activity within Outlook client, including load of non-default forms

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:messagetrace
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Inbound email triggers execution of mailbox-stored custom form

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Not all tenants may enable audit logs of custom form activity or COM component usage in Office
Ruler-style delivery may come from external accounts with forged headers or low reputation
Frequency of form triggers may be anomalously high compared to baseline Outlook usage
